duties_responsibilities.duty: Thorough understanding of Precision Optics market and customer's products, and how optics and coatings are used in them.
Satisfy existing customer needs and increase business by understanding customer products.
Proactively seek opportunities to grow new sales and achieve annual sales objectives.
Communicate with customers regularly, including scheduled customer site visits.
Keep up-to-date on the optics industry and customer industries to maximize knowledge and authority during customer contacts.
Research and identify new markets and develop new customers.
Work with and communicate internally with engineering and production teams to meet customer requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Physics or Material Science (Master's preferred)
